column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Being a tourist in Chicago
column2: your trip isn't complete without trying some deep-dish pizza - so
column4: my Hubs and I walked over to Lou Malnatti's.  It was around 2pm
column5: and the place was packed.  We were seated right away
column6: and ordered the Manati Chicago Classic.  We were told that it would take 30 minutes for the pizza.
